dream_realm.models module

class dream_realm.models.Album(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

Represents an album in the database.

title

The title of the album.

Type:

str

release_date

The release date of the album.

Type:

Date

genre

The genre of the album.

Type:

str

description

A description of the album (can be blank or null).

Type:

str, optional

spotify_link

The Spotify link to the album.

Type:

URL

cover_image

The cover image of the album.

Type:

ImageField

user

The user who added this album to their collection.

Type:

ForeignKey to User

exception DoesNotExist

Bases: ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned

Bases: MultipleObjectsReturned

cover_image

Just like the FileDescriptor, but for ImageFields. The only difference is assigning the width/height to the width_field/height_field, if appropriate.

description

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

favoritealbum_set

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

genre

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

dream_realm.views.add_favorite(request, album_id)[source]

Add an album to the user’s favorites.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The request object.

  • album_id (int) – The ID of the album to add to favorites.

Returns:

Redirects to the album list or a specific album detail page.

Return type:

HttpResponseRedirect

dream_realm.views.album_detail(request, album_id)[source]

Render the details of a specific album, including whether it’s in the user’s favorites.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The request object.

  • album_id (int) – The ID of the album to display.

Returns:

HttpResponse
